name: SouthLabs
tag_list: iphone, mobile, smartphone, cocoa, winmo7, silverlight, sharepoint, office, advergames, casual-games, 3d
overview:
SouthLabs is the company behind SharePlus, the iOS critically acclaimed client app for SharePoint.

SouthLabs expertise lies in the development of mobile software applications for smart-phone platforms, such as the iPhone & iPad, Android and Windows Mobile 7. Product lines include mobile clients for enterprise document managers, casual games, and utility applications.

SouthLabs is a story about a couple of software developers from Uruguay that at some point during 2009 decided to part ways from their former employers, after developing enterprise information systems for corporate clients for more than 10 years, and start a new software house, attempting to leverage years of experience, and a desire to develop a product based business model.

milestones.description: SharePlus is a native iPad client for SharePoint, Microsoft's popular content manager. Existing iPhone clients for SharePoint don't support browsing in offline mode, this is one of the features we believe could make SharePlus stand apart from it's iPhone
milestones.source_description: SharePlus iPad client for SharePoint accepted in the app store

milestones.description: SharePlus is picked as one of the apps for enterprise in AppleÂ´s page
